You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesG G] > &gjcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&GJcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0403/index.htm U+00403].
  * `&gjcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0453/index.htm U+00453].
